casebody.data:
No. 10-711. National Union Fire Insurance Company, Petitioner v. VP Buildings, Inc. 562 U.S. 1279, 131 S. Ct. 1602,

179 L. Ed. 2d 516,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2051. March 7, 2011.

Motion of Zurich American Insurance Company for leave to file a *517brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 606 F.3d 835.
